snippet: Supporters and opponents of same-sex marriage discussed the possible outcomes of the Supreme Court’s decision to hear two cases relating to the issue.
abstract: Supporters and opponents of same-sex marriage are actively voicing opinions over Supreme Court decision to hear two cases relating to issue; gay rights activists herald move as major advancement for movement, but there are signs of concern over implications of eventual court ruling.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Ian Lovett from Los Angeles, Malia Wollan from San Francisco, Robbie Brown from Atlanta and Jess Bidgood from Boston.

lead_paragraph: Supporters and opponents of same-sex marriage discussed the possible outcomes of the Supreme Court’s decision to hear two cases relating to the issue.

headline.seo: Gay Activists Weigh Possibilities of Marriage Ruling
headline.main: Worry Tempers Joy Over Gay Marriage’s Moment in Court
headline.print_headline: Possibilities of Justices’ Decision on Gay Marriage Raise Concern Amid Joy

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
